# summer

𒀭𒌓 Šamaš

𓈙 𓈗 𓇳 | Summer (season) | #šmw “Harvest” ShaMarRa summer schumera ☑ 𒌓 Shamash

𒉊 ˢemeš2 𒂍𒎌 ˢemeš SUMMER 𒂍𒈨𒌍 ˢe₂-me-eš; Akk. 𒉊 ˢummuʳ

𒅖 saḫar summer

𒆥𒋢 qe-suᵐᵃ qesuma
𒆥𒋢 qe-su קַיִץ qáyiṣ “summer; heat” +++
𒆥𒋢 qe-taᵐ ܩܲܝܛܵܐ qayṭa קיטא ⇔ *ḳayč̣- “hot; summer” قَيْظ qayẓ קֵיטָא qēṭā ⇔ 𓐍 𓏏 𓊮 | fire | ቃጥሎ ḳaṭlo +++

𒅖 kuš7 𒆥𒋢 #qēşu (ge)hitze "summer"

𒅆𒉸 Šimut = Mars

𔕿 knife : du-ši-um-ir-ra ⇔ 𔕺 summer 𓆳
𔕿 •Messer ma.uššaʳ ⇔ 𔕺 summer measure 𓆳
